sections.content:
Question:
Is there anything to be careful about when connecting Octal-SPI flash memory to the RZ/A3UL?
Answer:
Confirm the connectivity of the flash memory to be used with its manufacturer. 
Note also that multiple flash memory devices cannot be connected to the RZ/A3UL because it has 1 channel (4-bit).
Suitable Products
RZ/A3UL
